main event: A 15-year-old boy observed three round bluish-white objects traveling in a W formation at approximately 1000 mph, about 1000 feet in altitude.
interesting points: The objects were described as having no illumination and making no sound,The sighting lasted for about 5 and a half minutes,The objects were comparable in size to large non-commercial aircraft,The boy was certain the objects were not reflections as they were too clear,The objects moved into a position to make a perfect triangle formation.
